Uproar listens to Wheelie thoughtfully with a sigh to his voice.  He sits d=
own and hangs his head low.

" you're right, war just never seems ta just g=
o away.  It just keeps going no matter what we do.  Anyway, you're about ta=
 get grilled by Tucson or in for one of his lectures, depending on his mood=
.  Good chance he's still in a sour mood."

He gets up and continues to esc=
ort Wheelie to Tucson's quarters.  They come to a waiting area teaming with=
 many masterfully restored Cybertronian artafacts personally restored by Tu=
cson himself.  One such piece, an ancient cross bow lies displayed within a=
 glass case.  The lighting in the room reflects off the weapon's frame.  Up=
roar stops to admire it.

" Wow....  I've never seen this before, look at i=
t, Tucson actually restored this a long time ago.  And over to the left, an=
 ancient Cybertronian time piece."

He then points to other artifacts in th=
e room.

" He restored all these things.  I've never seen anything like the=
se.  It's like a window into the past."

Perpetually on the move and consta=
ntly busy.
